alert.note: Alert for Boone; Gallatin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:17PM EDT until May 21 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR OHIO...SOUTHEASTERN DEARBORN...NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND... BOONE...CENTRAL GALLATIN AND WEST CENTRAL HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rising Sun, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Florence, Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Walton, Rising Sun, Oakbrook, Burlington, Hidden Valley, Union, Cleves, Shawnee, Miami Heights, Mack, Wilmington, Grandview, French, Addyston and Hartford. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 73 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 171 and 182. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
